mapper.select: SELECT IMAGE_ADRES FROM SELER_IMAGE WHERE MBER_CODE = #{mberCode} ORDER BY SNO ASC
SELECT MBER_NCNM FROM MBER WHERE MBER_CODE = #{mberCode}

SELECT RV.REVIEW_DATE REVIEW_DATE , RV.REVIEW_CN REVIEW_CN FROM REVIEW RV JOIN SETLE ST ON RV.SETLE_CODE = ST.SETLE_CODE JOIN RESVE RS ON ST.SETLE_CODE = RS.RESVE_CODE JOIN VOCHR V ON RS.VOCHR_CODE = V.VOCHR_CODE WHERE V.MBER_CODE = #{mberCode} AND ST.PURCHS_DCSN_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT M.MBER_BRTHDY MBER_BRTHDY FROM MBER M JOIN RESVE R ON M.MBER_CODE = R.MBER_CODE JOIN SETLE S ON R.RESVE_CODE = S.SETLE_CODE JOIN VOCHR V ON R.VOCHR_CODE = V.VOCHR_CODE WHERE V.MBER_CODE = #{mberCode} AND S.PURCHS_DCSN_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY MBER_BRTHDY DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT O.* , ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT S.MBER_CODE MBER_CODE , S.SELER_AGE SELER_AGE , S.SELER_OCCP SELER_OCCP , S.SELER_APRSM SELER_APRSM , ( SELECT MBER_NCNM FROM MBER M WHERE S.MBER_CODE = M.MBER_CODE) MBER_NCNM , AVG_PRICE FROM SELER S JOIN ( SELECT MBER_CODE , AVG(VOCHR_PRICE) AVG_PRICE , MAX(VOCHR_REGIST_DT) VOCHR_REGIST_DT FROM VOCHR WHERE DELNG_AT = 'Y' GROUP BY MBER_CODE ) V ON S.MBER_CODE = V.MBER_CODE ORDER BY VOCHR_REGIST_DT DESC ) O ) WHERE RNUM >= ((#{cri.pageNum} - 1)* #{cri.amount} + 1) AND ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM

SELECT V.MEAL_PREARNGE_DT MEAL_PREARNGE_DT , V.VOCHR_PRICE VOCHR_PRICE FROM VOCHR V JOIN SELER S ON V.MBER_CODE = S.MBER_CODE JOIN RESVE R ON V.VOCHR_CODE = R.VOCHR_CODE JOIN SETLE S ON R.RESVE_CODE = S.SETLE_CODE WHERE PURCHS_DCSN_AT = 'Y' AND S.MBER_CODE = #{mberCode} ORDER BY MEAL_PREARNGE_DT ASC
SELECT V.MBER_CODE FROM VOCHR V JOIN RESVE RS ON V.VOCHR_CODE = RS.VOCHR_CODE WHERE RS.RESVE_CODE = #{setleCode}
